# Vite + Arima

## One-liner

```bash
# Run #1, #3, and #4
yarn && yarn build && node dist/tw-arima.js
```

## 1. Project setup

```bash
yarn
```

## 2. Compiles and hot-reloads for development

```bash
yarn dev
```

## 3. Compiles and minifies for production

```bash
yarn build
```

## 4. Test build

```bash
yarn preview
```

